Name: Twins
Description: This legend is two separate size 1 characters, with the following features:

ListedItems.Description: Each track effects and hp separately.
However, combos and uses of per round abilities are tracked between both twins.
When this legend takes a turn, only one twin acts at a time, alternating if possible.

Name: Fatebound
Description: If a twin is reduced to 0 hp, they become defeated as normal. However, starting at the end of the next player turn, and at the end of every player turn past that, if the other twin has at least 1 hp and is in range 5, the defeated twin returns from defeated and heals to 25% of their max hp.

Name: Blood Brother
Description: This legend is made up of four Brothers. Each Brother is a separate character, tracking hp and effects separately. The Band is only defeated when all Brothers are defeated. On each of the Band's turns, the Band acts with a different brother, until all have acted at least once. Each Brother has unique actions and a Bloodbound Blessing.

Name: Blood Bound Blessing
Description: Each time a Blood Brother is defeated, all active brothers immediately gain the Blood-bound Blessing of the fallen brother, empowering them.

Name: Blessing Boots
Description: All remaining Brothers become sturdy and gain The Boot.

Name: Iron Blade
Description: Attacks against bloodied foes gain true strike and slash them.

Name: Blessing Fixer
Description: One brother can use Grapple once a round.

Name: Dripping Blade
Description: Attacks force the attack target to sacrifice 3 after dealing damage.

Name: Blessing Filth
Description: All remaining Brothers gain Dripping Blade.

Name: Blessing Cats
Description: All Brothers gain Feline Felicity.

Name: Blessing Sharkie
Description: All Brothers gain Great Swindle.

Name: Blessing Pale
Description: All Brothers go to speed 5 and gain phasing.

Name: Keen Eye
Description: All attacks can critical hit (+[D]).

Name: Blessing Sharp
Description: All Brothers gain Keen Eye, and one brother can use Ricochet Shot once a round.

Name: Blessing Fanatic
Description: One brother can use Spark once a round.

Name: Aura of Bloodletting
Description: Aura 2. All foes that use an ability in the area, including basic abilities, must sacrifice 2 after the ability resolves. Bloodied foes sacrifice 5 instead.

Name: Blessing Broker
Description: All Brothers gain Defiance.

Name: Blessing Monger
Description: All foes are marked by Bounty Hunt.

Name: Net Worth
Description: The Midan's pernicious metal aether slowly turns everything on the battlefield into gold and precious jewels. Their abilities have more effects and deal more damage to foes according to their net worth. A foe's net worth is tracked with a d10, for each character.

Name: Perfection
Description: If a foe has 10 net worth at the end of their turn, they are fully encased in precious metals and jewels. Their net worth is reduced to 0, then they are defeated, removed from the battlefield, and replaced by a height 1 golden statue object with 10 hp. Return them to the battlefield, still defeated, when the statue is destroyed.
